original: Engvall, Karl Albert, tekn. direktör, Åtvidaberg, f. 4/1/08 i Ängsjö, Väst-mani. 1., av Erik E. o. Josefina Bo-holm. G. 26 m. Cecilia Pettersson. Barn: Birgitta f. 33, Sigrid 36. — Ex. v. KTH. Verkst:ing. i A-B Separator i TuHinge 26-28, i ASEA i Västerås o. Ryssk 29-30, i SKF i Gbg 30-40, tf. fabrxhef där 41-42, tekn. dir. i Åtvidabergs Ind. m. dotterbo’1. fr. 42. Skr.: art. i fack- o. .dagspre’s’s av tekn., ekon. o. pol. inneh.
translated: Engvall, Karl Albert, technical director, Åtvidaberg, born January 4th, 1908 in Ängsjö, Västmanland, first child of Erik E. and Josefina Boholm. Married on the 26th of [unknown month] in an unknown year to Cecilia Pettersson. Children: Birgitta born in 1933, Sigrid born in 1936. Graduated from KTH. Worked as an engineer at A-B Separator in Tullinge from 1926-1928, at ASEA in Västerås and Russia from 1929-1930, at SKF in Gothenburg from 1930-1940, acting as factory manager there from 1941-1942, and as technical director at Åtvidabergs Ind. with subsidiary from 1942. Published articles in professional, economic, and political trade and daily press.
